content.detailedDescription: While observing bright full moon.  atempting photograph of moon and noticed artifact ruining photo.  took video. i thought it was helicopter and waited for it to leave.  it did not.
content.summary: Orb around full moon

content.detailedDescription:
There seemed to be something falling in a straight line, with smoke behind it. the smoke resembled the smoke path seen trailing behind jets.  however the shape was more roundish shaped, and seemed to be maybe 5 to 10 times the width of the jet smoke stream just behind a jet.  i pulled over and tried to take a picture with my phone and camera but could not get either to focus.
i thought it was strange that while i was pulled over watching, i saw two jet streams as if two jets were flying towards the middle of the smoke path. the jets seemed to be going much faster than typical commercial jets, which take a long time to cross the sky.  i saw another jet stream which seemed to be going the direction of where the object might be presumed to land.  i had never seen two distant jets flying in parallel before so that made me wonder if it was military.
content.summary: Something roundish seemed to be falling, trail of smoke similar to a jet, 2 jets flying parallel towards the objects path

content.detailedDescription: On 11/227/2015 i went to the refidge to get something to drink and seen way off above the thees tree top level something that looked like a plane but te lights were flashing red one side to the other then switched to white and i decided to not go to sleep i woke up and found my pants fully zippered buttoned with the belt buckled? who does that? not me not anyone yet i remember nothing.
content.summary: Looked like a plane with flashing red then white lights

content.detailedDescription: It was graduation night 1993. the night sky was quite impressive that night, a true site to see.  i remember scanning the night sky thinking how this would be my last night home. i had walked to the end of the drive-way.  i was a delayed entry soldier that the very next day was going to boot camp.  it is when i turned to look back towards the house, that something stood out to me.  the stars were gone in my view and disappearing.  then came the lights.  i estimate the light panels to have been 12 tall and 6 foot wide, touching seem lessly side by side. this was a circular type craft so these giant light panels were on the outside edge.  they started in a clockwise motion very slowly.  the colors they were giving off was mesmerizing and beautiful.  my focus then shifted to the bottom of this craft.  running lights had come on, but not as you would expect.  the glow came from crevices and glowed on the bottom.  what i am staring at is not metallic in nature, it is stone.  rocks the size of a cargo container or a semi tractor trailer. the entire circumference of the craft i estimate to be the size of a football stadium.  the rocks on the bottom were not smooth but jutting at various angles but seemingly as an upside down pyramid with no tip.  the craft slowed to a stop above me.  as i face my home, the craft floated in at treetop level from the west.  there was no sound.  a buzz or energy seemed to be in the air.  my next memory i am now facing in the direction north  watching it slowly creep over a row of trees.  it had done a change of trajectory over my head.  i ran into the house and found my father more than a bit pissed. saying he had been all around the house yelling my name.  30 minutes had passed.  my father has not really ever talked to me since that night.  i often wondered if he might have seen something.  in boot camp i was a squad leader and was given what i think were like a 4-5 man room separate from the main dorm that housed the rest of the men.  it was then that i would catch myself sleep walking, even the fire guard would catch me, saying i was making no sense.  i do not know if it was shock from my encounter, or a side affect of it.  i was given a top secret clearance and assigned the to air defense artillery. my job was to field test a new radar system trying to feed real time data to the toc's. the use of this new system would also integrate  the avenger systems to lock onto the deemed enemy targets the radar specified.  also was expandable by linking up to awacs.  the radar system was the anmpq-64 gbs ground based sensor.  i want to comment this is peace time.  i did 6 ntc rotations, including time at white sands.  working with the techs from hughes aircraft company.   i did my first 3 years 1/5th ada ft. stewart ga.  was given an honorable discharge, and re-enlisted to ft. hood tx.  as my honor and pride set in as a patriot that ran the same woods as george washington as a child, my guilt over carrying the burden for years set in.  i found myself driving the battery commander one day and i brought up my concerns that our radar system would not catch something like what i had witnessed.   remember this is 1998 and i have just told my superior officer that i have had a ufo experience.   and we happen to be in a military air defense battalion, oh and i have a top secret clearance, and was the first team to field the system.  i was told to take some leave time.  which was no issue for me had allot saved up.  so took 45 days.  went up the coast of california with some friends into upper cali and oregon.  nothing was out of the ordinary when i signed out for leave.   on day 33 i received a call from a friend still at the base telling me i was considered awol the mps had been by the house.  my battalion commander and s-4 had pulled my leave form from the cq desk, saying it was unapproved.  so in one sweep my security clearance was pulled, i was wanted.   i turned myself in a couple months later.  they bought me a bus ticket to ft. sill to out process.  i was given a less than honorable discharge for my second tour.  inability to adapt.   history will remember me as a un desirable, unrecognized by the same country whom i tried to warn, and help.   i personally view this matter is 1 of nation security.  at the very least we are being monitored as our technology advances.  my mos was a 14j  my job was to not only run the radar system, but to visually identify every known craft in the world's flying arsenal.  this was not a man made craft unless it is time travel in some form or matter.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Other
content.summary: True experience revealed for first time. how will history remember me?

content.detailedDescription: I had seen this before the date landing in the sea around one year before . when it come down it was so fast it had left rings like donuts and inside one white line off smoke . but it was a cold day so it had to be just hot steam type rings. anyway a year later i was having my lunch around 12.30 afternoon. and i just looked out of the window which is a big window 10 ft by 40 feet so big. and i just seen it come out of the sea and it shot straight up out in to space but it had left the same donut rings and a stream in the middle .As it went up the donuts were abart as it went from first being 3 feet apart next one was 15 feet and  so on it was so fast . it seems it was under the water for a year why . i was working just across the rod from were it happened. did not get any photo . but it happened. i think something is  going on in the sea in scotland.  google map of were 57.40'25.33"n  2.59'24.59 w elv 1m im210m this should help find where it was. it is in scotland . you may contact me if you wish happy to help yours sincerely  mr m stuart.  i had to say unknown to most .As you dont have strait up or down.
content.summary: It was a disc black

content.detailedDescription: I had just got off from work at lowes in gulf breeze florida and was on my home, on the way seen these bright yellow/red orbs of light moving slowly across the highway drove down till i could do a u turn went back to where the was and parked in dave’s oyster bar and grill in gulf breeze and got out and watched them floating through the sky just above the trees someone else had stopped and seen them also not sure who they where but it was weird and strangest thing i've ever seen i took about 14 pictures and picked out the best 5 and posted so you can see them. thanks
content.summary: Bright yellow/red orbs of light moving slowly across the sky weird and strange

content.detailedDescription: While driving tward house saw a series of orange lights in very unnatural configuration hovering as if to form a very complex, tight constellation. it is important to note there wer no stars visible in the overcast sky. more and more orbs appeared so we pulled over to take picture. unfortunatley other vehicles kept pulling over and their light made it very difficult to get a good pic. i talked with several other witness and none had seen anything like it, except for on tv, as i mentioned the orbs over mexico which was closest compareson i could come up with. the orbs began to break formation, all in seperate movement but in general heded east away from our position. as they became more sparse and further apart the lights began to simply fade out, as if either dimming or as i feel, moving away at a very high speed. when the last one caded we all looked at eachother, made a few puzzled comments and went on our ways.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Saw a tite grouping of orange orbs, no stars present. many in vroups of 3. numbers increased forming a cluster with a trail. eventually began to desperse and either faded or dissapered into darkness.

content.detailedDescription:
***i doubt my report will be of any valuable information, nor do i believe in extraterrestrial visitation.  i am extremely scientific and logical but i feel it is worth being told as i have harbored an uneasy feeling since the sighting.

in late october of 2015, a friend and i were walking towards a familiar park at approximately 12am to play frisby.  my friend had just purchased a fairly powerful green laser pointer and we were pointing at stars and planets in the night sky.  almost immediately upon our arrival to the park, we spotted a single white light traveling directly overhead at about 90° at what seemed a very high altitude and a rate of speed that did not seem possible.  my first thought was a meteorite, however the light followed a straight sw course over the mountains and out of sight.  it covered the entire breadth of the sky in roughly 3 seconds.  this single sighting had us veey excited and we scanned the sky even more intensely probably out of a heightened sense of paranoia.  about 30-40 seconds after the single bright light was out of sight, we both spotted an extremely bizarre aircraft that had no lights, sound, trail and moved at what seemed to be a standard speed for modern planes.  it travelled the identical sw course until we lost sight of it.  i would estimate its altitude to be around 3000-4000 feet and blended into the dark sky reasonably well.

the second craft can be explained most likely as a military stealth plane and i would think it to be coincidental that we spotted it heading the same direction as the first.  the difference in speed and elevation between the two objects was substantial.

the first object, a single white light i would think was a heat shield that was producing the light.  although it was so far away we couldnt make out a shape, the speed alone is the most frightening part.  it was as fast as the fastest meteorites i have ever witnessed only it followed a perfectly straight course over the mountains and out of sight.

again, i have no reason to believe either object was extraterrestrial, but simply cannot grasp how humans have developed a craft that rivals the speed of the fastest meteorites within our atmosphere.

i should also note that my friend tried to reflect his laser off of the second, lower object and no light was reflected.  im quite sure it would have reflected the green light if it was within a mile or two as we have tested the laser in the mountains, proving it can be seen from several miles.
content.summary: 2 different sightings witnessed within 60secs.  first at high altitude at impossible speed.  second at low altitude, normal speed, shape was chevron, no lights or sound, very stealth like.

content.detailedDescription: I was out late at night i have some telescopes. but it was warm i was sky watching from our deck. around 2:00 am, maybe a little later. there was a vivid contrail. maybe from nw to se. all it was the  doughnuts on a rope contrail. i just thought it was so interesting. this may not be the sight to tell it or even if it`s not normal in our sky`s. no aliens, or ship, just this neat looking contrail. i star watch a lot. and repoted to mufon about lights that were not normal when i had shown my flashlight up. i was saw movved i bought one for the mufon guy to show how strong a beam it has. but it was ruled ? some light whatever. but a person really believes he see`s what he see`s, the mufon group or whoever were wrong. but ha, someday we will know the truth. wether we are alive now or 10 yrs 20 yrs from now, whatever.   i wish i could draw an image on here. sorry. i read below i could send a sketch. oh damn.
content.summary: I saw no ufo, but i lookup- i did see a vivid contrail.

content.altitude: Landed, Treetop, 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: My first encounter on this property happened twelve years ago, when i was fourteen years old. i awoke one morning and floating outside my window was a yellow glowing orb about the size of a bowling ball. as soon as i looked at it it shot straight up into the sky, it didn't seem to be propelled by anything as if it were attached to a string. for the past year now me and my mother have watched as more and more of these orbs have started appearing around the surrounding mountains. there is one large orb that appears in the same spot every night at the top of a mountain, i have watched with binoculars as smaller orbs jolt back and fourth around the large orb, while the do this the orbs start to glow very brightly, they also sometimes absorb into the large orb. it is the craziest thing i have ever seen. i have also notices sets  of orbs that look like the headlights of a car turned on its side, one on top of the other. they seem to know when they are being watched because they sometimes blink off when me and my mm try and observe them. this needs to be investigated, they have shown up every night for over a year now. i'm willing to take a polygraph, whatever. all i know is something very strange is happening in canoncito new mexico. please please contact me, also i have seen two sets of  six unmarked black apache helicopters fly over my house, i will take a lie detector test. i have tried to obtain quality footage of these orbs but my camera sucks on my phone, i will try to purchase a camera with a zoom good enough to zoom in on them. thanks.......
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Me and my mother have observed several glowing lights surrounding our property for over a year now.

content.detailedDescription: I stepped outside with my dog,then, i saw what was like a small cotton ball and there wasn't a cloud to be seen.  as it caught my eye a passenger jet flew between my position and the object. it was stationary for a moment then moved a little then stopped. then the object shot out a cone shape with some blue sky between the cone. both the object and shape were white in color. seconds after the cone shape shot out the cotton ball object seemed to implode in itself and disappeared. the event lasted a minute or so. i couldn't believe my eyes and have no idea what it could have been.
content.summary: Cotton ball like object and cone shape shot out of it.

content.detailedDescription: Sitting on porch and over tree lined ridge lights appeared looked like a slow turning motion , followed by 3 light orbs in a row behind it ,lasted at least 2 mins. no sound.  size maybe 3 houses wide
content.summary: Slow moving  turning followers by 3small orbs

content.detailedDescription: I was at my aptmnt. in venice it was a weds i was off work that day it was night time went to trash area in apt building decided to smoke a rolled cigarette and proceeded to star gaze for apprx.5 mins.Observing a certain area of night sky looking at a certain group of visible stars.Observing stars closely n calm remained eye sight and watch the star twinkle brighter and less brighter fallowing its disposition out of sky.The star i thought i was looking at started to move literally at the same time of disbeliefe kept watching
content.summary: outside of apartment building star gazing.Star like object begins to move from stationary position in atmosphere proceeded to brighten change colour ,green,blue,red,white, and decrease in shape ascending to the atmosphere within a ten minute period

content.detailedDescription: I went in my backyard with my dogs. it's very clear, no cloud coverage. i looked up and saw 2 cylindrical objects,with almost an aura, prism shining out both sides.Hovering perfectly aligned, on top of each other. they were bright orange/red glowing. i watched for 2-3 mins and called my daughter, she came out and there was only one. we watched a few minutes and second one appeared next to each other hovering. she went in to see if any reporting were mentioned on web site. i stayed, a third one appeared. they changed positions in perfect unity also changed color, bright orange red to light white, just before disappearing.My first thought was helicopter. but it was hovering and shape was wrong and no sound. these objects hovered above the planes in pattern. i wasn't really afraid, in awe is more like it.  there also was at least two small planes that flew right under them during all of this. they didn't seem to want to disappear while planes were there.The speed they used to disappear was almost like vapor. they could change directions unlike a copter or plane.Ive never seen anything like this. my guess was about 15-20 mins. how long they were there before i went outside, i have no idea. after 15-20 mins. they, one at a time just disappeared.
content.summary: 2 cylindrical objects hovering.One disappeared, then the other. then 3 reappeared hovering. 2 small planes went under them at one point.

content.detailedDescription:
I had seen this several times in the sky and realized i could not really look at it from my terrestrial position. 
i then got a telescope and a image for it that hooks to my computer with usb.  i was then able to take a video of it.
see video.
there are starting to be a growing number of witnesses that have seen this now.  
now i am also seeing this thing up in salt lake city utah.
content.summary: Multicolored light in the sky

content.detailedDescription: Daughter was doing homework in bedroom,it faces southeast on second floor approximately 10:15 pm. working on computer she looked out her window and noticed bright white light hovering in distance. called me and my wife wondering what it was? wife looked out window and then i went outside to observe. at first thought it was jet, but didn't seem to move.No aviation lights located on object or any jet/airplane sound. just kind of hovering, then within a few minutes i noticed light was getting larger as it was coming towards us. moving slowly and steady it eventually flew right over my head and our house. no noise until it was directly overhead and then i could hear whooshing sound. it was triangular shape with four red rotating beacons on the bottom rotating counter clockwise and a large white intense light in the front. i could make out shape as it blocked out sky and stars. object eventually flew off in nw direction and we lost view as it passed over trees and house. this was second sighting for my daughter and wife in a year. i missed the first sighting as i was a sleep at the time. my daughter will now only do her homework with the shade pulled down at night as she does not want to see this happen again. i feel there was something very unsettling about the incident.I am now very much in tune with any weird type of lights that i may observe in the sky.
content.summary: Hovered for first 5 minutes, then flew directly over house

content.detailedDescription: My son and i were driving south on rt 95. all off a sudden traffic slowed down. my son asked me "what is that??" i looked out my window and saw something i have never seen before. orange lights, in the formation of the big dipper. it then changed formation quickly. the lights broke off into a few other patterns, and i saw a bunch of the lights consolidate into one. they then went to a v-formation and disappeared immediately.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Orange lights in the sky

content.detailedDescription: My daughter & i were walking out of our house towards the car. as soon as we got outside, we look up to see this fireball hovering for a second then sped off fast(hundreds miles per hour) going in mostly a straight path then decending downwards slightly. this object had a fireball trail & at first thought it was a meteor but there was a blinking light on craft & the way it sped off wasn't meteorish. it was lower than plane height(little below clouds) and about 1/4 mile away from our house. as soon as i saw it i knew what i had just seen. my daughter & i were shocked. we ran back into the house to tell my mother what we had just seen. so cool.
content.summary: See detailed description

content.detailedDescription: I was taking a few random pictures of clouds blowing in. i wanted to capture the sun peeking through a break in the clouds. i didn't see or notice anything out of the ordinary when i was looking up. i snapped the shots i wanted then returned to work not viewing the pictures until the next day. the first picture looks normal until you study it. the is a very vivid triangle in the clouds. the second picture was taken seconds after the first one. i looks normal other then a blue aura or sphere off center. when i zoom in i see something very clear that i have not ever seen before. i do not know what to call it. that is why i am getting in contact with you today.
content.summary: The image appeared in 1 picture i was taking of the clouds/sun. i didn't pay attention or notice anything in the sky. the next day i was viewing the pictures i had taken and noticed a strange triangle shape in the first picture. when i viewed the picture

content.detailedDescription: I was getting off work and was looking at a very beautiful sunset standing in the small parking lot of my employer. in a south westerly direction i observed a light seen above a cloud. it slowly began to descend (or go behind) the cloud and was no longer visible to me. i continued to look in that direction. shortly after (possibly thirty seconds to a minute later) another light appeared in almost exactly the same place. the light faded in from a blue sky. it took two to three seconds to fade in. it was in motion while it faded in. like the previous object, it was also near the cloud and was moving "down." due to parallax it could be moving either down or southwesterly. it's uncertain to me. the descent was slow. it covered roughly  3 angular degrees in five to seven seconds in it's observed flight path. it disappeared behind the cloud. then a third light was observed in the almost exactly the same location. it was observed to do basically the same thing. i hurriedly went inside to tell someone what i saw. they came outside. they did not see anything and went back inside. i stood in the parking lot for another few minutes and saw the fourth light. it was in the same place and did almost exactly what the other three lights did (slowly descend behind a cloud.) i stayed outside for a few more minutes. shorly after, a small aircraft flew overhead. it had a light on it that was white. the light was periodic and gradual like a sine wave. the light on the plane seemed to repeat every three seconds from off to on and back again. it also had a smaller strobe light. as it flew over me i could hear it's propeller engine. it was travelling from north to south and flew below cloud cover over me about 50 degrees from the horizon. it was probably less than a mile away.
content.summary: Four successively descending bright objects in roughly the same area of the sky.

content.detailedDescription: Observed this object on the ground, but looked like car tail lights. didnt pay much attention to, until it raised into the air. object went straight up to about 1000 feet. then flew southwest for several minutes.And reversed direction now headed to the northeast. as it came closer it looked like an aircraft, because of the marker lights on it. object was know at about an elevation of about 5000 feet as it flew over us. my son looked at it through binoculars as it flew over and said it was triangle shaped. i took the binoculars and caught a brief glance of it as it went over the trees, and sure enough it was triangle shaped.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Ended up being triangle shaped craft

content.detailedDescription: Stepped out onto front porch, noticed a yellowish / burnt orange light moving from my ne in a southernly direction in the sky. my girlfriend asked me "what is that? is that a plane?" i answered no as most planes that i see have red / green / white lites that flash. continued to observe the light which after about 45 seconds +- stopped moving, it remained motionless for approx 30 sec +-, though it seemed to backtrack for just a moment. it then started moving in what seemed to be a 90 degrees from its original line of travel in a westernly direction. it moved approx 5 - 10 degrees across the sky then stopped and started rising until it was no longer visible. the whole thing lasted for approx 3mn+-
content.flightPath: Stationary,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Watched light / object move in striaghtline, stop and hover, change direction then go straight up until it could no longer be seen

content.detailedDescription:
Unidentified lights
1850 26 nov 2015
seen in western henrico county, va.

diagram is a photo of the area described below with elements added to help visualize what i witnessed. the lights depicted are the approximate size and locations i saw them. two maps are also provided. text keyed to diagram:

1. about 1850 i opened the front door of our house for our son who was leaving after thanksgiving dinner. there is a glass storm door between the object and me. i looked out and immediately noticed the object in the position indicated. it was quite obvious and so unusual i shouted out to my family. (i am a professional photographer with more than 40 years experience. this was not a reflection.)

the object consisted of nine bright lights (the red in my drawing is about right, the blue should be as bright); three red above three blue above three red. there were no other lights. the lights were equidistant horizontally and vertically and aligned. the vertical spacing was somewhat tighter so the lights formed a horizontal rectangle of about 4:3 ratio.

when spotted the lights were in motion moving horizontally from right to left. i first saw them behind the clump of trees that in the drawing they appear to be in front of. they were definitely behind them. they passed behind the pine and disappeared behind the apartment building. the yellow arrow indicates the movement as i saw it.

this camera view to the corner of that apartment building is almost directly due south. its movement was not rapid, but it was only in view for 4 or 5 seconds. i changed my vantage point to see if it appeared at the end of the building, but did not see it again. it had gone behind the building when my wife and son came out. i was the only observer.

2. because it was so unusual and obvious and the weather was pleasant, i remained outside for a while to see if it would reappear. at about 1905 i began watching an aircraft light moving as per the arrow in no. 2. it was obviously an aircraft; the red port wingtip light was readily visible.  a few seconds after first seeing that aircraft, i noticed no. 3.

3. this looked identical; the white light was apparently of the same size and brightness. it also moved at a similar speed to aircraft no. 2. suddenly, however, it stopped, and then began to move vertically downward. it moved at a constant rate, about the same speed as the aircraft.

4. when it stopped the red-blue-red colored lights appeared. i could not see the nine of the original, just three, but they seemed elongated. i had the sense that the object had rotated slightly on its vertical axis. i believe that had it continued the rotation, the nine would have been visible. however, it did not. it continued downward at the same rate to no. 5.

5. here it sat for 3 or 4 minutes. at no time was there ever any waver or variance in position or variance in the lights. there was absolutely no movement or change in what i observed. the lights simply stopped and stayed in one place. during this time i was able to change my viewing position in several directions attempting to get a better view and some sense of distance.

6. after that time, the object continued the descent and disappeared once again behind the apartment building.

my wife had come out to see it this time and saw it for about 2 minutes until it disappeared.

comments: 
•	the skies were perfectly clear. the full moon was about 10-15 degrees above the eastern horizon to my left. 
•	i am very familiar with aircraft of all types and observations under all weather conditions, day and night. 
•	i am also familiar with both military and civilian drones. 
•	the size of the light grouping at no. 1 could not have been a hobbyist’s drone. to be the size i saw, the lights would have had to been on the near side of the apartment, not behind it. 
•	when i changed perspective at no. 5, there was a large change in apparent relationship between distant intervening trees.
•	i noticed no sound other than normal vehicle traffic. i saw no one else outside.
content.summary: Unidentified lights 1850 26 nov 2015 seen in western henrico county, va.

content.detailedDescription: Hi,i witnessed a ufo sighting in 2011,i know its nearly taken 5 years to report this to you buy ive only just found this site..I am a emergency locksmith,i find myself working all hours.A customer was locked out of his house and i gained entry to his property.Leaving the job and then driving through the village of thorner at about 2 a.M, just passed the beehive pub i opened my window a little to let smoke out from cigerette.I happened to look through the gap at top of the window.Thats when i saw the ufo.A slow moving,saucer shaped,no lights,grey metalic,that perfect saucer shape,leaving behind itself what looked like a vapour trail,for some reason i believe the trail was a heat trail,i only saw the ufo briefly but i could tell it was not a meteor.I could see it was a craft.What did i see?I will probably never know..Before this encounter i didnt believe,thought ufos sightings were made up,cranks,e.G..Pardon my spelling
content.summary: Ufo passed over my car

content.detailedDescription: I have seen quite a bit of ufos especially after learning about the hopi ant people, i'm mohegan myself so native culture is an interest of mine.  after watching an episode of ancient aliens i remembered seeing a face book post about mother ships appearing in iowa or something like that, and like i said ever since i learned about the origin of the gray (ant people) i have seen all kinds of ships from square crafts to cloaked ones pretending to be a plane moving really slow yet the sound traveling one thousand feet behind it then the sound stoping and the plane lights turning off and then like flouresent lights it flickered the real ones on into a real v shaped craft and poof it zipped into space right above me.  so i decided to look out side for the big one since they alway like to give me a show, but since i don't have a good camera and only my phone i pointed the camera towards the moon invade one flew over me while i looked around the sky for potential motherships, as i began to film i noticed a star like object in the distance but from previous experience i knew i couldn't record the little tease in the distance. in the recording u even hear me say " what no motherships".  i recorded for about 1 minute and 47 seconds.  i figured i was wasting my time so i gave up looking and reviewed the video.  upon observation i noticed that the moon grew over double the size, and i didn't hit zoom one time, there was no glare around the moon for auto focus and there are even clouds that r going in front or it during the moons enlargement, they do not change size. this happens about 47 seconds into the video right after u hear me say come on to the ship in the distance.  i know for a fact that the moon does not grow especially in a second and in the same place, and after it grows is when i say i'm very unsatisfied.  so it has to be a ufo do to the fact it was really going along with me while i was complaining to the craft in the distance.  i have always wanted something to send to mufon hoping to one day be apart of the ufo craze.  i have pointed out to people and even friends ufos on many occasions and not only have i pointed them out but they go along with what i'm thinking on a personal level.  like i said before they stick around when people r with me and even if i pull my phone out so if i get a good camera or even get up with someone from any ufo investigation company such as mufon we could get some hard evidence, and this is just the tip of the iceberg.  i also have some more interesting things to show not ufo related and on a way bigger scale that really can't be explained but that's for another place and time.
content.summary: Was recording for ufo motherships lol and cam was pointed at moon, out of no where the moon grows, no zoom, clouds stay same

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: I am doing star-seeing, looked at 224 degree sw head to seattle over the washington lake, suddenly there is a flying object flight from right to left in my eye sight, i was think it is a commercial airplane, but it's extremely bright and unwavering, no noise, no airplane in my eye sight at that time, it's has a dark triangle at top and 2 dark at its edges, flight path is unusual as any commercial airplane, after 10 seconds it suddenly stop and the light is blurred and totally disappear from the sky in less than 5 seconds, i have never seen anything can speed up extremely like that. after ufo seeing, there is an airplane, but i can recognize it immediately, because the led light is blinking and not bright
content.summary: Ufo was seen in kirkland wa
